alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Reynolds; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 2:30AM CST until February 16 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CST FOR CRAWFORD...NORTHWESTERN IRON...NORTHERN REYNOLDS AND SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 230 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Steelville to 7 miles west of Viburnum to 6 miles southwest of Bunker, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Viburnum, Courtois, Bixby and Cherryville around 240 AM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Anthonies Mill. This also includes Onondaga Cave State Park, Johnsons Shut-Ins State Park, and Dillard Mill Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
